title: The Conjuring - Caiçara Case - Based on a True Story
description: The Caiçara Case was a true story of paranormal occurrence in Brazil. A family moves into a house where strange phenomenon starts to happen. The Christian symbols fail to expel the evil. Only one thing can save a religious image given to a girl, the firstborn of the family, by an Amerindian (Native American).
author: Waldon Volpiceli
